projectGridLines.title: AI Mentor – Intelligent Quiz System for Student Performance Assessment
projectGridLines.description:
Description: 

The AI Mentor project aims to create an intelligent quiz system that adapts and provides personalized quizzes to students based on their learning pace and performance. Using advanced AI techniques, including Large Language Models (LLMs) and reinforcement learning, the system will generate quizzes, evaluate student responses in real time, and provide insightful feedback. The AI will assess student weaknesses and recommend specific areas for improvement, ensuring continuous personalized learning. Over time, the system will also track progress and adjust quiz difficulty to match the student's learning curve.

Skill Sets

  • Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT, PaLM
  • Reinforcement Learning
  • Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch
  • Data Analytics and Adaptive Learning Algorithms
  • Front-end Development (React, Angular)
  • Cloud Platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)

Traits expectation:

  • Analytical and innovative thinking
  • Problem-solving with a focus on educational solutions
  • Ability to design interactive systems with real-time feedback
  • Strong collaboration and communication skills
  • Passion for the EdTech industry

Expected learning: 


  • Experience with LLMs for educational content generation and adaptationHands-on skills in building adaptive AI-driven quizzes
  • Understanding how reinforcement learning improves student performance over time
  • Practical exposure to deploying AI solutions on cloud platforms
  • Insights into data-driven approaches to personalized education

Specific courses required for project execution:  


  • AI in Education: Personalized Learning and Adaptive Systems (Coursera)
  • Applied Machine Learning and AI Specialization (Coursera)
  • Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning (Udacity)

  • Cloud AI Solutions Architect (Google Cloud)

projectGridLines.title: AI Evaluator – Automated Handwriting Recognition and Evaluation System
projectGridLines.description:
Description:


he AI Evaluator project focuses on developing an AI-powered system that can automatically evaluate handwritten student assignments. By using cutting-edge technologies like Computer Vision, Optical Character Recognition (OCR), and Large Language Models (LLMs), the system will recognize handwriting, analyze the content, and provide instant evaluations. The system will assess grammar, spelling, structure, and content accuracy while generating detailed feedback for students. Teachers will also benefit from a streamlined grading process, allowing them to focus more on teaching. The AI Evaluator will learn from evaluation patterns, improving accuracy with each assessment.

Skill sets:


  • Computer Vision (OpenCV, YOLO, Faster R-CNN)
  • Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
  • Large Language Models (LLMs) for Content Evaluation
  • Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch
  • Natural Language Understanding (NLU)

  • Cloud AI Deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP)


Traits expectation: 


  • Strong attention to detail
  • Ability to develop and fine-tune AI models for handwriting recognition
  • Knowledge of educational evaluation processes
  • Passion for solving real-world problems using AI

  • Collaborative mindset and teamwork skills

Expected learning:


  • Hands-on experience with AI-driven handwriting recognition
  • Practical knowledge of applying LLMs for text evaluation and grading
  • Advanced understanding of computer vision and OCR techniques
  • Insights into deploying large-scale AI models on cloud platforms
  • Real-world experience in automating student assessment processe

Specific courses required for project execution: 


  • Deep Learning for Computer Vision (Coursera)
  • Optical Character Recognition Using AI (Udacity)
  • Large Language Models for Natural Language Understanding (Coursera)

  • AI for Real-World Grading Systems (EdX)
